alert.note: Alert for Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 11:57AM EST until January 01 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville Bypass affecting Trigg and Christian Counties. .Recent moderate to heavy rain has caused rises in the South Fork Little River. For the Little River...including Hopkinsville - 68/80, Hopkinsville - Bypass...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Little River at Hopkinsville - Bypass. * WHEN...Until this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 18.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
